subject: moving beyond remote
body: this afternoon i did an erasure of slack's "[Moving beyond remote: Workplace transformation in the wake of Covid-19](https://slack.com/intl/en-gb/blog/collaboration/workplace-transformation-in-the-wake-of-covid-19)" and this is [a recording of me reading it](https://photos.app.goo.gl/gQkZCdgqkJ2MKsLz7)
normalized_markdown: this afternoon i did an erasure of slack's "[Moving beyond remote: Workplace transformation in the wake of Covid-19](https://slack.com/intl/en-gb/blog/collaboration/workplace-transformation-in-the-wake-of-covid-19)" and this is [a recording of me reading it](https://photos.app.goo.gl/gQkZCdgqkJ2MKsLz7)
